txt.en:
'I greet you as one burglar to another, [placeholder], but you have far exceeded my skills. I may steal a precious treasure, and its loss is discovered when I am long gone, but you are so skilled that its loss is never discovered at all!

'There aren't many who can claim such proficiency as you. One such is Sterling Proudfoot, as canny a hobbit as you could hope to find. I imagine that you and he could have quite a time of it, discussing the tricks of our most honourable trade!

'If you agree, I'd expect that you could find Sterling Proudfoot somewhere in Buckland, west of the town of Bree.'

'If you agree, I'd expect that you could find Sterling Proudfoot somewhere in Buckland, west of the town of Bree.'
Burglar: The Truest Course is Awareness

'Sterling Proudfoot, the great burglar, is likely in his home of Buckland, west of the town of Bree, in Bree-land.'
As a Burglar, you have achieved such renown as to receive a summons from Sterling Proudfoot of Buckland.\n\nYou should seek Sterling Proudfoot to receive further training in your class.

Sterling Proudfoot is in Buckland, west of the town of Bree, in Bree-land.\n\nYou have been told to speak with Sterling Proudfoot, a skilled burglar who likely has much to share about your chosen career.
'Sterling Proudfoot, the great burglar, is likely in his home of Buckland, west of the town of Bree, in Bree-land.'

'It's a pleasure to meet you, [placeholder]. Not many burglars reach our level of skill, you know. If you ask me, that's a good thing -- less competition for the best treasure!'
Meet Sterling Proudfoot for further Burglar training
You are a light shadow flitting against the moon, only seen when you wish to be, a soft breeze on the night air, soon past.
